statements: DELETE FROM trading_fees WHERE fee_amount >= 100.00 AND transaction_type = 'Buy';
DELETE FROM arbitrage_expenses WHERE expense_type = 'Exchange Fee' AND expense_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM cost_analysis WHERE total_cost < 500.00 AND analysis_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM transaction_expenses WHERE vendor_name = 'Vendor X';
DELETE FROM trading_fees WHERE trade_date < '2022-01-01' AND fee_amount > 1000
DELETE FROM transaction_expenses WHERE expense_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
